name: Play Codenames
global_prompt: You are going to the codenames together. In each turn, the spymaster will give a one word hint and the guesser will guess valid words based on this

players.name: Spymaster
players.role_desc: You are the spymaster. You need to give a one word hint to the guesser followed by a number indicating how many words on the grid relate to the hint, your hint should be inspirative and should not be the word in the 25 words.

players.name: Guesser
players.role_desc: You are the guesser. You need to select which words you think are related to the clue. The output of your answer should only contain the words you guess.
